title: 侵明明係等埋老婆但被人剪片屈佢神智不清

replies.msg:
"HAHAHAH 侵連部直昇機係邊都唔知" 就輕鬆55K RT
https://twitter.com/TomJChicago/status/1302803724134502401?s=20

左膠如獲至寶瘋狂叫好: (仲有D藍tick account )
So now we know why they tried to tweet about Biden wandering around the cemetery

Good heavens. Waves goodbye. Takes two steps - apparently- toward the helicopter then loses focus and starts to “meander”.

Whoa. Total brain freeze there.

My dad had dementia. Trump's behavior reminds me so much of how he acted as time went on. Eventually my dad became like a toddler. Trump looks just like a toddler wandering around, noticing the puddle, then recognizing he's lost, and looking for mommy.

Trump2020: "mindlessly lumbering and zigzagging in the grass towards a puddle"

事實係一條舊片比人剪頭剪尾:
https://twitter.com/charliespiering/status/1302977343615574017?s=20


大家都要記住
唔好因為「啱聽」而忽略了真實性
